dict.string: tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" set frontmost to true click menu item "Duplicate" of menu "File" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell

tell application "Finder" set sel to selection if ((count sel) > 1) then set firstItem to item 1 of sel set _result to POSIX path of (firstItem as text) else if ((count sel) = 1) then set _result to POSIX path of (sel as text) else set _windows to count windows if (_windows = 0) then set _result to "" else set _result to POSIX path of (target of window 1 as alias) end if end if end tell _result
tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" set frontmost to true click menu item "Back" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell

tell application "Finder" set sel to selection if ((count sel) > 1) then set firstItem to item 1 of sel set _result to POSIX path of (firstItem as text) else if ((count sel) = 1) then set _result to POSIX path of (sel as text) else set _windows to count windows if (_windows = 0) then set _result to "" else set _result to POSIX path of (target of window 1 as alias) end if end if end tell _result
tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" set frontmost to true click menu item "Forward" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell
tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" set frontmost to true click menu item "Enclosing Folder" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell
tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" set frontmost to true click menu item 1 of menu of menu item "Recent Folders" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell

file_path="$*" file_name="${file_path##*/}" file_without_ext="${file_name%.*}" parent_folder="${file_path%/*}"
cd "$parent_folder" mkdir "$file_without_ext" mv "$file_name" ./"$file_without_ext"/"$file_without_ext".zip cd ./"$file_without_ext"
unzip "$file_without_ext".zip mv "$file_without_ext".zip ~/.trash open .

use framework "AppKit" (* this line has to appear before the "on run" line of Alfred (or other functions) *) set allFrames to (current application's NSScreen's screens()'s valueForKey:"frame") as list set X to item 1 of item 2 of item 1 of allFrames (* main screen *) set Y to item 2 of item 2 of item 1 of allFrames -- resize: left half screen set topLeftX to 0 (* replace with "(x/2)" for right half of screen *) set topLeftY to 0 set width2 to (X * 0.4) (* replace with "X" for right half of screen *) set height to Y tell application "Finder" to set bounds of Finder window 1 to {topLeftX, topLeftY, width2, height}

use framework "AppKit" (* this line has to appear before the "on run" line of Alfred (or other functions) *) set allFrames to (current application's NSScreen's screens()'s valueForKey:"frame") as list set X to item 1 of item 2 of item 1 of allFrames (* main screen *) set Y to item 2 of item 2 of item 1 of allFrames set topLeftX to 0 (* replace with "(x/2)" for right half of screen *) set topLeftY to 0 set width2 to (X * 0.4) (* replace with "X" for right half of screen *) set height to Y tell application "Finder" to set bounds of Finder window 1 to {topLeftX, topLeftY, width2, height} delay 0.5 --tell application "Finder" to close every window
TO_TOUCH="$*"/Untitled touch "$TO_TOUCH" open -R "$TO_TOUCH" sleep 0.5 osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke return'

tell application "Finder" if (count windows) is 0 then activate tell application "System Events" to keystroke "n" using {command down} delay 0.1 end if set currentDir to target of Finder window 1 as alias end tell POSIX path of currentDir

tell application "Finder" if (count windows) is 0 then activate tell application "System Events" to keystroke "n" using {command down} delay 0.1 end if set currentDir to target of Finder window 1 as alias end tell set finderWindow to (POSIX path of currentDir)
- blank/link file creation: the default folder will be used when no Finder window is open
return either first selected file or return current window when there is no selection
copy path of selected file or current Finder window
return either first selected file or return current window when there is no selection
copy name of selected file or current Finder window
default size, then close all windows
